item.title: Microsoft's Latest Update Turns Every Windows 11 PC Into 'AI PC'
item.description: Microsoft announced that it will enable users to utilize its Copilot feature for AI-powered searches and tasks via text, voice, and vision.

item.title: SharpLink Gaming To Raise $76.5M Through Equity Offering: Retail Sees No Reason To Cheer
